alert.note: Alert for Perry; Wayne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 11:52PM CDT until April 01 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN WAYNE AND SOUTHERN PERRY COUNTIES... At 1151 PM CDT, a confirmed large and extremely dangerous tornado was located near Olive Hill, or 13 miles northeast of Savannah, moving east at 45 mph. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW! HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible. The tornado will be near... Waynesboro around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Clifton and Flatwoods. TORNADO...OBSERVED TORNADO DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a large, extremely dangerous and potentially deadly tornado is on the ground. To protect your life, TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
